page.title: 12The Recreation Centre
page.content:
In the Recreation centre you can play games or do cookery or other things. In the summer they have a treasure hunt where the helpers give you a piece of paper and on it you write a word. We wrote PLAYSCHEME. You had to find the letters and say where you found them. The helpers take the little ones to the park sometimes. At the recreation centre there is a tennis court and a bowling green. Sometimes they take you out to play football on the grass.
In the recreation centre there is a table tennis table. Sometimes they have a table tennis contest to see who is the best player. There is a practice on a Wednesday night from 7.30 till 8.
